May I have your order ID, please?"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 11211, "end": 12953, "text": "My order ID is OneRingToRuleThemAll."}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 13253, "end": 19731, "text": "Thank you, Frodo. Let me check the status of your order."}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 20031, "end": 27322, "text": "It seems your ring is currently on its way to Mount Doom. ETA is within the next week."}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 27622, "end": 29828, "text": "Frodo, my dear boy! How fares the journey?"}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 30128, "end": 34679, "text": "Gandalf! It's been quite the adventure. We're just waiting for the ring to arrive at Mount Doom."}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 34979, "end": 37951, "text": "Excellent! Remember, keep it secret, keep it safe."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 37551, "end": 40059, "text": "Don't worry, Gandalf. The ring is safe with me."}, {"participant_id": "3", "start": 40059, "end": 42544, "text": "Excuse me, I need to inquire about my sword order."}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 42844, "end": 44887, "text": "Of course, may I have your order ID?"}, {"participant_id": "3", "start": 45187, "end": 46650, "text": "My order ID is RangerSword."}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 46950, "end": 53173, "text": "Thank you. Let me check the status of your order."}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 53473, "end": 56468, "text": "It appears your sword is currently in transit and should arrive shortly."}, {"participant_id": "4", "start": 56768, "end": 59369, "text": "Aragorn, my friend! Have you lost your sword again?"}, {"participant_id": "3", "start": 59469, "end": 61396, "text": "Legolas! No, it's just delayed."}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 60196, "end": 65513, "text": "I've located your order, Aragorn. Your sword should be with you soon."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 65513, "end": 67417, "text": "So, Gandalf, how's your day been?"}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 67717, "end": 71246, "text": "Oh, you know, just dealing with dragons and dark lords. The usual."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 70846, "end": 72030, "text": "Nothing too exciting then."}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 72030, "end": 74004, "text": "Just the fate of Middle-earth hanging in the balance."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 73104, "end": 75380, "text": "Right. Well, I hope you get some rest soon."}, {"participant_id": "4", "start": 75380, "end": 76982, "text": "Have you seen any orc activity lately?"}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 77282, "end": 79697, "text": "Indeed, there have been sightings near the borders of Mordor."}, {"participant_id": "4", "start": 79297, "end": 80365, "text": "We must remain vigilant."}, {"participant_id": "3", "start": 80365, "end": 83221, "text": "My sword has finally arrived! Thank you for your assistance!"}, {"participant_id": "2", "start": 83521, "end": 94388, "text": "You're welcome, Aragorn. If you need any further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 94688, "end": 97962, "text": "I can't wait for the ring to arrive. The ring will arrive soon enough."}, {"participant_id": "4", "start": 101093, "end": 102858, "text": "I'll keep watch for any signs of trouble."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 103158, "end": 105875, "text": "Thank you, Legolas. Your keen eyes are invaluable."}, {"participant_id": "1", "start": 106175, "end": 110285, "text": "I must depart now. There are matters I must attend to. Farewell, my friends."}, {"participant_id": "0", "start": 110585, "end": 113627, "text": "Farewell, Gandalf. May the stars shine upon your path."}]}
